title: Lost in the Dream
lyrics:
La la la la la La la la la la
Achim-i balg-eumyeon maebeon salajineun neo
Maeil gidohae (kkum-i anigil)
Dasi jamdeul ttae (naege angigil)
Kkum-in geol al-ado heeo naojil moshae

Hwansang-ilado (aleumdaun neo)

Geulimjalado (gajgo sip-eun na)



Nan maeil bam neol chaj-a gat-eun kkum-eul hemaeyeo

Meomchugo sip-eodo beos-eonal su eobs-eo nan

Dal-i tteumyeon sijagdwae

Neul ttoggat-i banbogdoeneun bam



Chulaghadeus ppajyeodeul-eo gipsug-i pagodeuneun

Dream bulleojwo you jab-ajwo you

I sungan sog-e tago deul-eo

Jeoldae kkaeeonal su eobsneun dream

Bulleojwo you jab-ajwo hwansang-iljilado



Igeon eojjeom bunmyeong hwagsilhan yejimong

Maebeon banbog doeneun nae somang-ui baeg-ilmong

Nalkaloun choseungdal du gwien neugdae ul-eumsoli

Dasi sijagdoemgwa dongsi neol chajneun naui mogsoli

Yeah yeah I’m lost in dream

I feel like empty and clean

But your shape gets more bigger than me

Even that i can’t reach out like a tree

Make me free, make me lean

And baby make me see

Don’t make me lost in the dream

Just come let’s make a dream



I bam-eul neomgimyeon gwaenchanh-eul geolan gidae yeah

Jeo dal-i jamdeulmyeon (ppajyeodeul-eoga)

Dagagalsulog (huimihaejyeo ga) hey



I gip-eun bam sog-ui nan kkeutdo eobs-i mang-gajyeo

Jiugo sip-eodo nega jakku keojyeoga

Geuleon mankeum wiheomhae naleul ilh-eogado gwaenchanh-a



Chulaghadeus ppajyeodeul-eo gipsug-i pagodeuneun

Dream bulleojwo you jab-ajwo you

I sungan sog-e tago deul-eo

Jeoldae kkaeeonal su eobsneun dream

Bulleojwo you jab-ajwo hwansang-iljilado



Sasil nan ijochado haengbog-ilji molla

Neo tteonan sunganbuteo gyeokkge doen fantasy



Huimihaejineun siya

I gotong-eun doghadi doghae

Sabang-i eojileowo ppajyeo naojileul moshae

Ppajyeo naojineun moshaneun

Dangsin-ui angae gat-eun pum

Geudae an-e jamgyeo jug-eodo joh-euni

Mewojwo dangsin-ui sum

U got me and I got u

Things that we got never flew

Please don’t wake me up in this dream

Wait babe I gotta feelin’ u



Nae jeonbu-in neoleul ilhgo nan dwi

Milyeon-i mandeun naui hwansang-i

Naleul deo olg-amaeeo negeseo meolge hae



Chulaghadeus ppajyeodeul-eo gipsug-i pagodeuneun

Dream bulleojwo you jab-ajwo you

I sungan sog-e tago deul-eo

Jeoldae kkaeeonal su eobsneun dream

Bulleojwo you jab-ajwo hwansang-iljilado



La la la la la La la la la la

Lost in the dream
